s = input()

odd = "RUD"
even = "LUD"

for i in range(len(s)):
    if i % 2 == 0 and s[i] not in even or i % 2 == 1 and s[i] not in odd:
        print("No")
        break
else:
    print("Yes")

print("Yes")

s = input()

odd = "RUD"
even = "LUD"
for i in range(len(s)):
    if i % 2 == 0 and s[i] not in even:
        print("No")
        exit()
    elif i % 2 == 1 and s[i] not in odd:
        print("No")
        exit()

print("Yes")

s = input()

if all(c in "RUD" for c in s[::2]) and all(c in "LUD" for c in s[1::2]):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

s = input()

odd = "RUD"
even = "LUD"

for i in range(len(s)):
    if i % 2 == 0 and s[i] not in even:
        print("No")
        exit()
    elif i % 2 == 1 and s[i] not in odd:
        print("No")
        exit()

print("Yes")

s = input()

odd = "RUD"
even = "LUD"

for i in range(len(s)):
    if i % 2 == 0 and s[i] not in even:
        print("No")
        exit()
    elif i % 2 == 1 and s[i] not in odd:
        print("No")
        exit()

print("Yes")

s = input()

if all(c in "RUD" for c in s[::2]) and all(c in "LUD" for c in s[1::2]): # 偶数番目がRUD, 奇数番目がLUD
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")


s = input()
print("Yes" if all(c in "RUD" for c in s[::2]) and all(c in "LUD" for c in s[1::2]) else "No")

a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(a * b)
